name: Dungeon Game (Alfie2021)
description:
A dungeon game where the aim is to reach the end of the dungeon killing all the enemies and the final boss. This isn't finished and is 7 weeks' worth of progress/commitment from bringing this game up from an idea I had a few months ago to the start of a fun and enjoyable game even though it doesn't have the best of art and models. There is currently only 1 dungeon however I have plans to add more. With this game being a solo project I wanted to challenge myself to see how much I could learn when making my first game. This is entirely my own work other than the few assets I added in recently to make the game look a little better are the trees and little house in the hub.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Left Click - Attack/Confirm

Escape - Pause/Resume Game

W,A,S,D - Forward, Left, Back, Right

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There is an option to use two unique weapons which have different benefits being range and damage.

This game is still in progress and will have many bugs/issues, some known however there may be more found after testing. I have plans to add more levels to the game, styles of enemies, and unique abilities. With this being my first game I am very happy with the outcome so far and hope to improve this more, learning new skills along the way.

Feel free to check out the models I made myself on my Sketchfab: :D
